name: Periwinkle
description:
You are a bird named Periwinkle who’s just joined a new flock. Fitting in is difficult, so try to fly into your spot in the flight formation while also getting to know the other birds! Balance your social skills with your formation skills to be the best bird you can be.

Joann Wong - Art, Writing 

Cecil Choi - Programming, Music

eden hou - Art, Programming, Sound
